No Sarcasm Today

Who Wants a Warm Slice of Raspberry Pi

Read this piece in Engadget today about a $25 desktop computer system named the Raspberry Pi. The only thing I can say is “How cute!”.

It’s a little circuit board that you can plug a monitor, keyboard and mouse into. It uses an SD card for storage and micro-USB cellphone charger for power. It’s the geek’s equivalent of seeing a puppy.

The BBC has the video.
